§6The Vat§r is a §erefinery-like machine§r that can produce §evarious types of Liquids by combining 2 items into a fluid§r. It is commonly used to make §9Firewater§r for the §6Grains of Infinity§r and §9Nutrient Distillation§r for the §6Killer Joe§r. There is also different items that can be used for a §ebetter multiplier§r.

It can be crafted with an §6Industrial Machine Chassis§r, a §6Cauldron§r, a §6Furnace§r, 2 §6Electrical Steel Ingot§rs, 2 §6Fluid Tank§rs (§5EnderIO§r) and 2 §6Dark Steel Ingot§rs.
